headline.main: NAZI SKIPPER INDICTED; Captain of Tanker and Aides Accused of Sabotage at Boston

lead_paragraph: BOSTON, April 2 (AP) -- Captain Ernst R. Heitzmann of the German tanker Pauline Friederich, four of his officers and five members of the crew were indicted today by a Federal grand jury on charges of sabotage.
abstract: Germans from Fauline Friederich indicted as saboteurs
snippet: BOSTON, April 2 (AP) -- Captain Ernst R. Heitzmann of the German tanker Pauline Friederich, four of his officers and five members of the crew were indicted today by a Federal grand jury on charges of sabotage....
